Name: Who is There?
About the game: Who Is Here is a first-person indie horror game designed to instill fear in the player. Most of the time you will have to walk and explore the apartment in search of a way out, but whoever is in the apartment will not let you go so easily. You need to interact with objects, be attentive, explore all corners to find a way out. Functions: Location exploration - the game is a walking simulator, here you will explore the location without being distracted by survival. Puzzle solving. To progress further, you will need to solve challenges and puzzles. Non-linearity - the passage may differ from your actions. Interactive Objects - Interact with physical objects to solve puzzles. Warning: There are no saves in this version, keep this in mind when you start playing. The passage will take approximately 1 hour of play.
